mapper.select: select id, date_id, date_type, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from rider_calendar where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into rider_calendar(date_id, date_type, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{dateId}, #{dateType}, #{isDelete}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy})

insert into rider_calendar(date_id, date_type, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.dateId}, #{entity.dateType}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})

insert into rider_calendar(date_id, date_type, is_delete, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.dateId}, #{entity.dateType}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update date_id = values(date_id), date_type = values(date_type), is_delete = values(is_delete), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update rider_calendar
date_id = #{dateId},
date_type = #{dateType},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
